children.name: visible
children.description: Gets or sets the visibility of the current element.

children.name: rotate

parameters.name: angle `Number`
parameters.description: The angle of rotation in decimal degrees.Measured in clockwise direction with 0 pointing "right".Negative values or values greater than 360 will be normalized.

children.description: Rotates the element with the specified parameters.

children.name: position
children.description: Get or sets the element position.

children.name: content
children.description: Gets or sets the text block content.

children.name: y
children.description: The Y position of the top-left corner of the text block.

children.name: x
children.description: The X position of the top-left corner of the text block.

children.name: width
children.description: The width of the text block.

children.name: text
children.description: The content of the text block.

children.name: height
children.description: The height of the text block.

children.name: fontSize
children.description: The font size of the text block.

children.name: fontFamily
children.description: The font family of the text block.

children.name: color
children.description: The text color of the text block.
